text.p: Chelsea beat Middlesbrough 2-0 (halftime 1-0) in the English F.A. Cup final at Wembley on Saturday.
Scorer: Roberto di Matteo 1, Eddie Newton 83

Chelsea - 30-Frode Grodas; 17-Scott Minto, 6-Steve Clarke, 5-Frank Lebouef, 20-Frank Sinclair, 2-Dan Petrescu, 24-Eddie Newton, 16-Roberto di Matteo, 11-Dennis Wise, 10-Mark Hughes, 25-Gianfranco Zola (9-Gianluca Vialli 89).

Middlesbrough - 25-Ben Roberts; 14-Curtis Fleming, 5-Nigel Pearson, 18-Gianluca Festa, 17-Clayton Blackmore, 11-Fabrizio Ravanelli (9-Mikkel Beck 24), 8-Robbie Mustoe (4-Steve Vickers 29), 6-Emerson, 21-Craig Hignett (7-Vladimir Kinder 75), 10-Juninho, 20-Phil Stamp.
